events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision involving their car and a tree leading to significant damage on the front bumper and hood.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and photos of the damaged vehicle.
An experienced agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to handle this collision case promptly and efficiently.
The customer received formal acknowledgment of their claim submission, confirming receipt and initiation of the process.
Additional documents such as the police report, vehicle registration, and photographs were requested for further investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents, including the police report and repair estimates from the mechanic.
The investigation team began assessing the claim details, focusing on damages, liability, and coverage terms.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the damages are covered and the policy is active and valid for the incident.
A settlement offer based on repair costs and policy limits was proposed to the customer for approval.
The customer responded positively to the offer and expressed satisfaction with the handling and communication thus far.
The claim was formally approved based on the agreed settlement after meeting all policy requirements.
Payment covering the agreed settlement amount was issued promptly to the customer’s bank account.
The claim was closed successfully following payment issuance and confirmation that the customer’s vehicle repairs were underway.
All documents and records related to the claim were archived in the company system for future reference.
